snippet: Norman Lear, the creator of boundary-crossing TV comedies like “All in the Family,” has written a memoir, “Even This I Get to Experience,” reflecting on his 92 years.
abstract: Norman Lear memoir Even This I Get to Experience will be released by Penguin Press mid-October; book explores his experiences creating boundary-crossing television comedies.
lead_paragraph: Norman Lear, the creator of boundary-crossing TV comedies like “All in the Family,” has written a memoir, “Even This I Get to Experience,” reflecting on his 92 years.

headline.seo: Norman Lear’s Memoir, ‘Even This I Get to Experience’
headline.main: Those Were the Days, Not Simple or All Sweet
headline.print_headline: Those Were the Days, Not Simple or All Sweet
